title: Adjust post-login splash screen to show only icon and appear on every app open while signed in

requirements.text: Update the splash/intro screen UI so it displays only the gallery icon animation and does not render any welcome text (e.g., remove the "Welcome to MyGallery" heading).

quotes: After Internet Identity login, the splash should show only the icon (no 'welcome to gallery' text)

acceptanceCriteria: When the splash screen is visible, no welcome/title text is shown anywhere on the splash screen.
The animated gallery icon remains visible and centered on the splash screen.

requirements.text: Change the splash/intro triggering logic so that when a user opens/refreshes the app while already authenticated (existing Internet Identity session/delegation), the splash screen is shown once on that app load before navigating to the main Home page.

quotes: The splash should appear every time I enter the app while signed in.

acceptanceCriteria: If the user is already authenticated and reloads/opens the app, the splash screen appears once before the Home page renders.
If the user is not authenticated, the app does not show this post-login splash and instead shows the unauthenticated welcome/login screen flow.
Within a single app load, the splash screen does not reappear again after it completes unless the page is reloaded/reopened or the user logs out and authenticates again.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep all changes confined to the existing splash/intro behavior and UI; do not introduce new authentication providers or flows.
nonGoals: Changing the unauthenticated WelcomeIntroScreen content or layout beyond what is required for the splash behavior.
